posts.post_content:
Sale Pending

Have a nice 1912 T227 Cobb, Honest long cut Ty Cobb.
Graded by sgc in a 30 holder.

If you have been watching, some very poor examples of this card have been selling lately in the $1,000 range including one on ebay today that was all creased up and missing paper on the back:  see below

[IMG]https://www.gfg.com/baseball/t227cobb.jpg[/IMG]



Below, you can see the one I am offering, very nice card, probably just a minor problem away from being a vg sgc40, but still, a very presentable card!


Price:  $3,250, includes express mail delivery in the U.S.

[IMG]https://www.gfg.com/cardimg/862/121593.jpg[/IMG]



Thanks
